metadata.synopsis: The player has entered the Moonrise prison during the assault (with some warning against in most cases). This is a final heads up to the player that the skeletons they are fighting will just keep respawning with no reward, so it is best to leave asap.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe mooassault_alive 1oe mooassault_cleartower (kills all the enemies in the tower except roof)Go to the prison (right side of tower, stairs going down)Kill a few skeletons

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The battle won't be won down here.
